assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: EHS is an inventor on several patents licensed to Genzyme, a Sanofi Corporation, that describes the diagnosis and treatment of NPD. P Mabe has received a speaker honorarium form Genzyme, a Sanofi Corporation, and BioMarin. Also she has received support for assistance to scientific meetings from Genzyme, BioMarin and Shire. P Mabe and SZ have received research grants from Genzyme, a Sanofi Corporation. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
